title: Magnesium oxide nanoparticles as novel sustainable approach in enhancing crop tolerance to abiotic and biotic stresses
content:

Environmental stress factors including abiotic stresses (heavy metals, drought, and salinity etc.) or biotic pathogens (bacteria, fungi, and nematodes etc.) contribute to major losses to global crop yields and cause...
